title: Introducing: JOSEPH
body:
A little late on the pick up with **JOSEPH**, who according to the fantastic blog [SelfBlown](http://selfblown.

co.uk/joseph-swim-darker/), has been kicking around for a while now. The only track available on his Soundcloud so far is the stunning, unfurling beauty of _Swim Darker_. Elements of King Krule and Bipolar Sunshine kick in, with its poignantly raw, soulful nature. Check out _Swim Darker_ below.

The only track available on his Soundcloud so far is the stunning, unfurling beauty of Swim Darker. Elements of King Krule and Bipolar Sunshine kick in, with its poignantly raw, soulful nature. \[…\]
